message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product.  Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,000,000.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $600,000. This is a more reasonable price, considering the market value of the product.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the price. However, this product offers significant value beyond the standard market considerations.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $950,000.
I appreciate your willingness to come down on the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm proposing $825,000. This is the best I can do, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
